flavorText:
"It's not just you. Everyone makes it angry."
—Ardenoth, elvish nature advocate

foreignData.flavorText: „Nimm es nicht persönlich. Jede Kleinigkeit macht es wütend."—Ardenoth, Elfischer Fürsprecher der Natur
foreignData.name: Marodierendes Reißhorn
foreignData.text: Das Marodierende Reißhorn greift in jedem Kampf an, falls möglich, es sei denn, du kontrollierst eine Kreatur namens Fürsprecher der Bestie.

foreignData.flavorText: "No eres solo tú. Todo el mundo parece irritarlo."—Ardenoth, defensor natural élfico
foreignData.name: Laceracuerno merodeador
foreignData.text: El Laceracuerno merodeador ataca cada combate si puede, a menos que controles una criatura llamada Defensor de la bestia.

foreignData.flavorText: « Ne le prenez pas personnellement. Il en a après tout le monde. »—Ardenoth, partisan de la nature elfe
foreignData.name: Cornetale en maraude
foreignData.text: Le Cornetale en maraude attaque à chaque combat si possible à moins que vous ne contrôliez une créature appelée Partisan de la bête.

foreignData.flavorText: "Non è colpa tua. Si arrabbia con tutti."—Ardenoth, difensore della natura elfico
foreignData.name: Razziatore Straziacorno
foreignData.text: Il Razziatore Straziacorno attacca in ogni combattimento se può farlo, a meno che tu non controlli una creatura chiamata Fautore delle Bestie.

foreignData.flavorText: 「あんただけじゃない。あれは誰にでも腹を立てるんだ。」――エルフの自然の代言者、アーデノス
foreignData.name: 無法の槌角
foreignData.text: あなたが獣の代言者という名前のクリーチャーをコントロールしていないかぎり、無法の槌角は可能なら各戦闘で攻撃する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ビースト

foreignData.flavorText: "놈이 딱히 널 싫어하는 것은 아냐. 원래 누굴 봐도 화를 내지."-자연을 대변하는 엘프 아르데노스
foreignData.name: 난타뿔 약탈자
foreignData.text: 당신이 야수의 대변인 이라는 카드를 조종하지 않는다면 난타뿔 약탈자는 가능하면 매 전투마다 공격한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Não é só você. Todo mundo o deixa furioso.— Ardenoth, defensor da natureza élfica
foreignData.name: Bate-chifre Saqueador
foreignData.text: Bate-chifre Saqueador ataca a cada combate se estiver apto, a menos que você controle uma criatura com o nome Advogado da Fera.

foreignData.flavorText: «Нет, ты ни в чем не виноват. Он на всех так реагирует».— Арденот, эльфийский защитник природы
foreignData.name: Рогач-Опустошитель
foreignData.text: Рогач-Опустошитель атакует в каждом бою, если может, если только под вашим контролем нет существа с именем Защитник Зверя.

foreignData.flavorText: 「不只是你。人人都让它生气。」～妖精自然拥护人阿德诺斯
foreignData.name: 劫掠锤角兽
foreignData.text: 除非你操控名称为野兽拥护人的生物，否则劫掠锤角兽每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击。

foreignData.flavorText: 「不只是你。人人都讓牠生氣。」～妖精自然擁護人阿德諾斯
foreignData.name: 劫掠鎚角獸
foreignData.text: 除非你操控名稱為野獸擁護人的生物，否則劫掠鎚角獸每次戰鬥若能攻擊，則必須攻擊。

name: Marauding Maulhorn
originalText: Marauding Maulhorn attacks each combat if able unless you control a creature named Advocate of the Beast.

rulings.text: Marauding Maulhorn can attack if you control a creature named Advocate of the Beast. It just isn’t forced to.
Marauding Maulhorn checks whether you control a creature named Advocate of the Beast as attacking creatures are declared. At that time, if you don’t, Marauding Maulhorn attacks if able.

If, during your declare attackers step, Marauding Maulhorn is tapped, is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t attack, or hasn’t been under your control continuously since the turn began (and doesn’t have haste), then it doesn’t attack. If there’s a cost associated with having Marauding Maulhorn attack, you aren’t forced to pay that cost, so it doesn’t have to attack in that case either.

text: Marauding Maulhorn attacks each combat if able unless you control a creature named Advocate of the Beast.
